channel.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Point Release
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/w/images/4/47/Whonix_Facebook_Social_Share.png
This is a [point release](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release).
(Same as https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-virtualbox-15-0-0-6-6-testers-wanted/8370/5)
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
Alternatively, in-place are possible.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates
----
Notable Changes:
* [fix starting pkexec based applications from start menu](https://forums.whonix.org/t/cannot-use-pkexec/8129) (such as gdebi, synaptic, gparted) * Update Tor Browser to version 9. * https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-build-script-now-optionally-supports-installing-packages-from-whonix-remote-repository-rather-than-building-packages-locally/8107 * [use sudoedit rather than lxqtsudo editor](https://forums.whonix.org/t/use-sudoedit-in-whonix-documentation/7599) * [Whonix Networking Implementation Developer Documentation](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-networking-implementation-developer-documentation-feedback-wanted/8274) * usability: [replace default sudo lecture](https://forums.whonix.org/t/disable-or-change-sudo-lecture-at-frist-run-we-trust-you-have-received-the-usual-lecture-from-the-local-system-administrator-it-usually-boils-down-to-these-three-things/8323) * remove deprecated obfs3 from ACW * AppArmor Live Mode fixes * AppArmor enhancements * more seccomp hardening * https://forums.whonix.org/t/restrict-hardware-information-to-root/7329/2 opt-in ([documentation](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Workstation_Security_Hardening#Restrict_Hardware_Information_to_Root)) * https://forums.whonix.org/t/serial-console-in-virtualbox/8021 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/swap-swap-file-whonix-gateway-freezing-during-apt-get-dist-upgrade-encrypted-swap-file-creator/8317 * fixed https://forums.whonix.org/t/noscript-with-security-slider-at-safest-permits-around-30-sites/8160 * https://forums.whonix.org/t/send-sysrq-commands-to-virtualbox-usability-helper-virtualbox-send-sysrq/8369 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/keyboard-configuration-debconf-popup-during-apt-get-dist-upgrade/8318 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/command-not-found-warningcould-not-open-file-etc-apt-sources-list/7903
----
Full difference of all changes:
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.0.4.9-developers-only...15.0.0.6.6-developers-only
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute

item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Point Release
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is a point release.

(Same as Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Testers Wanted!)

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 27 Aug 19

VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

Alternatively, in-place are possible.

Whonix – 28 Oct 19

Operating System Software and Updates

Operating System Software and Updates

Notable Changes:

  • fix starting pkexec based applications from start menu (such as gdebi, synaptic, gparted)
  • Update Tor Browser to version 9.
  • Whonix build script now optionally supports installing packages from Whonix remote repository rather than building packages locally
  • use sudoedit rather than lxqtsudo editor
  • Whonix Networking Implementation Developer Documentation
  • usability: replace default sudo lecture
  • remove deprecated obfs3 from ACW
  • AppArmor Live Mode fixes
  • AppArmor enhancements
  • more seccomp hardening
  • Restrict hardware information to root opt-in (documentation)
  • Serial Console in VirtualBox
  • fix swap - swap file - Whonix-Gateway freezing during apt-get dist-upgrade - encrypted swap-file-creator
  • fixed Noscript with Security Slider at Safest permits around 30 sites
  • Send SysRq commands to VirtualBox usability helper - virtualbox-send-sysrq
  • fix keyboard-configuration debconf popup during apt-get dist-upgrade
  • fix command-not-found - WARNING:root:could not open file '/etc/apt/sources.list'

Full difference of all changes:

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.0.4.9-developers-only...15.0.0.6.6-developers-only

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 16 Nov 19

Donate

PayPal, Bitcoin, Monero, Bank Wire

Please contribute!

Whonix – 21 Nov 19

Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Read full topic
